category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0ConfigurationViewDisplayColumn
preference.preference_description: (Deprecated) Specifies if only the ID column, or only the Name column is to be displayed in the "Variant Configuration" view in the Product Configurator application. Valid values are "NameOnly" or "IDOnly" (default value). Values specified in this preference are case insensitive.
